name: hauslly

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c0, clly(cha)))
-| wss(cha, clly(cha))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c0, clly(cha)))
-| wss(cha, clly(cha))

|- wi(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c0, clly(cha)))
-| wi(wtru, wss(cha, clly(cha)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wtru, wss(cha, clly(cha)))
-| wi(wa(wtru, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cha), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), wcel(co(cv(hs1), crest, cv(hs0)), cha))
-| wi(wtru, wss(cha, ctop))
-| diffss(hs1, hs0)
-| diffsc(hs1, cha)
-| diffsc(hs0, cha)
-| diffsw(hs1, wtru)
-| diffsw(hs0, wtru)
body.pretty:
⊢ (T → Haus ⊆ Locally(Haus))
⊣ ((T ∧(hs1 ∈ Haus ∧ hs0 ∈ hs1))→(hs1[|`t]hs0)∈ Haus)
⊣ (T → Haus ⊆ Top)
⊣ d(hs1, hs0)
⊣ d(hs1, Haus)
⊣ d(hs0, Haus)
⊣ d(hs1, T)
⊣ d(hs0, T)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c0, clly(cha)))
-| wi(wa(wtru, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cha), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), wcel(co(cv(hs1), crest, cv(hs0)), cha))
-| wi(wtru, wss(cha, ctop))
-| diffss(hs1, hs0)
-| diffsc(hs1, cha)
-| diffsc(hs0, cha)
-| diffsw(hs1, wtru)
-| diffsw(hs0, wtru)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ Haus → c0 ∈ Locally(Haus))
⊣ ((T ∧(hs1 ∈ Haus ∧ hs0 ∈ hs1))→(hs1[|`t]hs0)∈ Haus)
⊣ (T → Haus ⊆ Top)
⊣ d(hs1, hs0)
⊣ d(hs1, Haus)
⊣ d(hs0, Haus)
⊣ d(hs1, T)
⊣ d(hs0, T)
